title: Optimization of the catalytic production of methyl stearate by applying response surface Box–Behnken design: an intensified green option for high-cetane biofuel manufacture
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17990-18002
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02750G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Federico Manuel Reyes-Cruz, Juana Deisy Santamaría-Juárez, Manuel Sánchez-Cantú, Roberto Quintana-Solórzano
To enhance the efficiency of processes by decreasing the reaction severity and energy consumption and reducing the equipment size, facilities' space and operation cost, process intensification is an increasingly used option in the chemical industry.
